resources.string: Please turn on your internet for logging in for the first time. It does not need to be opened for subsequent entries.
"Please check the create fixture button when logging in for the first time! You can use this area for the next entry and after the \"Show Fixture\" button. "
"Some things went wrong. If it is your first login, confirm that your internet is open and restart the program. If it is not your first login, please open and close the program! "
